description:
🎖️ TRUTH & TREASON – Official Trailer (2025) | New WWII Movie in 4K
In war, the enemy isn’t always across the battlefield. Truth & Treason is the gripping new World War II thriller of 2025 — a story of betrayal, loyalty, and the cost of survival.

🔎 Film Overview
Set during the final days of WWII, an Allied intelligence officer uncovers a conspiracy within his own ranks. With time running out, he must choose between exposing the traitor or protecting the mission that could end the war. The truth may win battles… but treason decides who lives.

A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.
